comments.text:
Created attachment 8985054
Bug 1467964: Make NodeAffectsDirAutoAncestor do what it claims re. anonymous nodes.

nsComboboxControlFrame creates an anonymous text-node, which isn't supposed to
change the directionality of the parent.

Review commit: https://reviewboard.mozilla.org/r/250774/diff/#index_header
See other reviews: https://reviewboard.mozilla.org/r/250774/
comments.author: emilio@crisal.io

comments.text: Is this a regression from bug 1451576?
comments.author: bugs@pettay.fi

comments.text: Tim, I'd prefer to revert that bug, it's not generally safe to do that, mind if I do that?
comments.author: emilio@crisal.io

comments.text: Let's revert the patch. I'll communicate to dev-l10n again to ask them to revert the strings.
